## Engine.VFS property

Exposes the virtual file system used by the underlying [ScriptingSystem](doc/markdown/./scene.scriptingsystem.md)<!-- -->'s registry.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get VFS(): VFS;

set VFS(vfs: VFS);
```
